data.name: accelerator.settings.index.template.headlines
data.value: Variants are listed in the Accelerator based on the following field

data.name: accelerator.filterfield.headline
data.value: Fields that are possible to use as filters on the public site

data.name: accelerator.validation.number
data.value: The number should be greater than or equal to zero

data.name: accelerator.validation.cart.doesnotcontainsproduct
data.value: Your cart is empty. This is probably due to inactivity.

data.name: accelerator.validation.deliverymethod.nolongersupported
data.value: Selected delivery method is no longer supported, a different method is selected automatically, please review your order.

data.name: accelerator.validation.ordertotal.haschanged
data.value: Order total has changed since last time the cart was re-calculated. Please check your shopping cart before placing the order.

data.name: accelerator.validation.paymentmethod.nolongersupported
data.value: Selected payment method is no longer supported.

data.name: accelerator.validation.product.nolongeravailableforsale
data.value: Some products are no longer available for sale, since last time the cart was re-calculated. Please check your shopping cart before placing the order.

data.name: accelerator.validation.productprices.haschanged
data.value: Product prices have changed since last time the cart was re-calculated. Please check your shopping cart before placing the order.

data.name: accelerator.validation.product.outofstock
data.value: {0} is out of stock right now. Product is removed from your shopping cart.

data.name: accelerator.validation.product.notenoughinstock
data.value: There are not enough {0} in stock. Shopping cart has been updated with the stock amount that we can deliver.

data.name: accelerator.deployment.createexampleproducts.label
data.value: Create a set of example products and categories

data.name: accelerator.deployment.validation.domainnameexists
data.value: The domain name already exists, please use another.

data.name: accelerator.deployment.validation.urlpath
data.value: The domain name cannot include multiple '/'.

data.name: accelerator.deployment.validation.channelexists
data.value: The channel name already exists, please use another.

data.name: accelerator.deployment.error
data.value: An error ocurred during the installation. Check the event log for further trouble shooting.

data.name: accelerator.deployment.field.definitions.notmatching
data.value: Accelrator can't be deployed. Field definitions in system is not matching what accelerator need. Check the event log for further trouble shooting.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.logotypemain.description
data.value: A logtype image that will be used for the website framework.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.logotypeicon.description
data.value: A logotype image that will be used for example in web browser tabs. Recommended size is 250 x 250px.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.headerlayout.description
data.value: Select between two headers. The one row option has one row with logotype, top menu, cart and more. The two option has one row with logotype, cart search etc, and a second row for caegory navigation links.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.checkoutpage.description
data.value: The page where the user ends up after clicking the checkout icon or link in the header.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.mypagespage.description
data.value: The page where the user ends up after clicking the My pages icon or link in the header.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.additionalheaderlinks.description
data.value: Additional links that will appear in the top right of the web site framework, next to the search and login links.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.searchresultpage.description
data.value: The page where the user ends up after performing a search.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.footerheader.description
data.value: The header of the footer column.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.footerlinklist.description
data.value: A list of links that are added to the footer column.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.footertext.description
data.value: HTML content that is added into the footer column.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.navigationtheme.description
data.value: Select between a category based or filter based navigation framework.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.infirstlevelcategories.description
data.value: Hides or shows the left menu of the pages showing the first category level.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.inbrandpages.description
data.value: Hides or shows the left menu of the pages showing information and products for a brand.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.inproductlistpages.description
data.value: Hides or shows the left menu of pages that are poitning out a product list.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.inarticlepages.description
data.value: Hides or shows the left menu of ordinary content pages.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.productsperpage.description
data.value: The number of products shown per page.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.showbuybutton.description
data.value: Whether to show buy button next to each product in product lists.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.showquantityfieldproductlist.description
data.value: Whether to show an input field for the number of products to buy.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.showquantityfieldproductpage.description
data.value: Whether to show an input field for the number of products to buy.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.filtersordering.description
data.value: Product filters will be shown in this order.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.filtersindexedbysearchengines.description
data.value: The product filters that should be indexed by search enginges.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.checkoutmode.name
data.value: Allow private or company customers (B2C or B2B)

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.checkoutmode.description
data.value: Select whether you want to allow private or company customers, or both, to buy from your site.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.allowcustomerseditlogin.description
data.value: A setting that allows customers to edit their username and password.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.senderemailaddress.description
data.value: The email address that will be used to send emails to customers.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.orderconfirmaionemailcontent.description
data.value: A link to the page which content will be sent as order confirmation email content.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.orderconfirmationpage.description
data.value: The page that will be displayed as order confirmation page.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.termsandconditionslinktext.description
data.value: The terms text show on page.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.pagesize.name
data.value: Number of products shown per page

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.categorypointer.description
data.value: For connecting landing page and product category

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.welcomeemailsubject.description
data.value: Ämnesraden i det välkomstmeddelande som skickas till nya kunder.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.welcomeemailtext.description
data.value: The content of the welcome email sent to new customers.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.orderconfirmationemailsubject.description
data.value: The subject header of the email sent for order confirmation emails.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.mayusereditlogin.name
data.value: User can edit login username and password

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.redirectlink.name
data.value: After login, go to this page

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenucategory.description
data.value: If a category is chosen, the link will redirect to the category in the first place. If no category is selected, the link will redirect to the page selected.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenupage.description
data.value: If a category is chosen, the link will redirect to the category in the first place. If no category is selected, the link will redirect to the page selected.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenushowcontent.description
data.value: When checked, the mega menu opens when the user clicks the link in the menu. If not checked, the user is redirected to the the link's target page or category when clicking the link in the menu.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenushowsubcategories.description
data.value: If a category is selected as the link's target, when checked, the mega menu lists the sub categories of that category.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenucategories.description
data.value: Content for the column will be, in prioritized order and if any content is selected: categories, pages, filters or the content of the editor.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenupages.description
data.value: Content for the column will be, in prioritized order and if any content is selected: categories, pages, filters or the content of the editor.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenufilters.description
data.value: Content for the column will be, in prioritized order and if any content is selected: categories, pages, filters or the content of the editor.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.megamenueditor.description
data.value: Content for the column will be, in prioritized order and if any content is selected: categories, pages, filters or the content of the editor.

data.name: fieldtemplate.productarea.productwithvariantslist.name
data.value: Product with variants shown in a list

data.name: accelerator.settings.searchindexing.template.general.templates.headline
data.value: Searching in Accelerator is based on selected fields. If the template doesn't have any selected fields then the search is based on all fields.

data.name: index.purchasehistories.queued
data.value: All purchase histories added to queue.

data.name: fielddefinition.websitearea.cookienotificationpolicypage.description
data.value: Pointing to a page where extended cookie policy are described
